DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 proof-of-concept study double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , 15-week investigation ganaxolone versus placebo treatment Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) . Up 120 subject enrol randomized receive either ganaxolone placebo 6 week . After 6 wks randomize treatment subject continue 6 wks ganaxolone . The aim study assess efficacy ganaxolone compare placebo treatment PTSD symptoms 6 week treatment use Clinician-Administered PTSD Rating Scale ( CAPS ) . The second aim study evaluate safety tolerability ganaxolone PTSD population .
